Package jinngine.geometry

Interface Summary
AxisAlignedBoundingBox A shape that encapsulates, or geometricaly bounds a given, usually more complex geometry.
ContactGenerator A contact generator is used by the ContactConstraint to generate its contact information.
Geometry A general encapsulation for geometries used in jinngine.
Material Material specifies physical properties for a geometric object, which are restitution and friction coefficients.
SupportMap3 A support mapping for a convex polyhedron.
 

Class Summary
Box A box geometry implementation.
ContactGenerator.ContactPoint A simple structure class representing a contact point with a normal and a penetration depth
ConvexSupportMap Constructs a support mapping of the convex hull of two different geometries (also given as support mappings)
Line  
Shape A shape is an explicit geometric representation.
Sphere Sphere geometry.
SphereContactGenerator Simple, fast, sphere-sphere contact generator.
SupportMapContactGenerator Implementation of a contact generator, handling pairs of convex objects, represented by support mappings.
SupportMapContactGenerator2 Implementation of a contact generator, handling pairs of convex objects, represented by support mappings.
